description: Dashboard for Micrometer instrumented services (Java, Spring Boot, Micronaut)

panels.description: The percent of time spent on Garbage Collection over all CPUs assigned to the JVM process.

targets.expr: sum(rate(jvm_gc_pause_seconds_sum{service=~"$service", implementation="$implementation", instance="$instance"}[1m])) by (service, instance) / on(service, instance) system_cpu_count

panels.title: GC Pressure

title: JVM (Micrometer)
